message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $19,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $19,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to lower it to $17,000. This is my final offer.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I still believe the product should be within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $14,000 for it. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
